title: Help Restore the Original Bodoni Punches
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103134733/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 21.Oct.2009 12.11pm 

Help restoring the Bodoni originals…  
... by becoming an affiliate to an alphabet of your choice.

The association “Friends of the Palatina Library and the Bodoni  
Museum” have created the initiative “Adopt a Bodoni alphabet” whose  
aim is to restore the full set of more than 600 alphabeths, their punches  
and matrices.

Located in Parma, Italy, the Museum needs to raise funds to be able to restore the lead characters,  
which also need to be conserved in an appropriate polycarbonated box.

With a few hundred euros you can become affiliate of one of your alphabets  
of choice. Or maybe you would like to adopt an entire Bodoni family?

The mentioned sum is used to restore an alphabetical set of Bodoni  
punches, currently in bad condition, oxidized and stored in an  
inappropriate place, and put it in a purpose-made polybicarbonate box for  
a proper preservation.

With some more money it is possible to restore a series of punches  
preserved in the original wooden cases.

The restoring is made by Studio Paolo Crisostomi in Rome, an experienced  
workshop dealing with antique and bibliographical stuff.

The donors will be publicly acknowledged and as affiliated will be  
recognizable by a plate on the case in which the punches will be stored,  
in the Museum’s exhibition.

For more info: Typevents Italy - Simone Angelica Wolf (Via Del Pozzo 6 -  
Reggio Emilia, phone 334-1814389, e-mail [simone@typevents.com](mailto:simone@typevents.com)).
